NEW YORK UNIVERSITY     ARTS AND SCIENCE     COLLEGE OF ARTS AND SCIENCE     GRADUATE SCHOOL OF ARTS AND SCIENCE                                 Home     People       Undergraduate Program       Graduate Program       NYU Florence       Events       Employment             Stay Connected           Facebook             Affiliations         Casa Italiana Zerilli-Marimò           Villa La Pietra               The Department of Italian Studies at New York University is one of the few in the country to offer a complete and interdisciplinary program of study and training in Italian language, culture, history, and society, from the elementary to the graduate level. Located in Greenwich Village in an area abounding in international flavor, artistic tradition, and intellectual vivacity, the department is committed to fostering intellectual inquiry and discovery.
